/usr/bin/c++  -std=c++0x -Wall  -O3 -DNDEBUG  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/SimpleRepeatVideo.dir/main.cpp.o  -o SimpleRepeatVideo  -Wl,-rpath,/home/huangyue/Pangolin/build/src ../../src/libpangolin.so -lGL -lGLU -lGLEW -lX11 -lpython2.7 -ldc1394 -lavcodec -lavformat -lavutil -lswscale -lpng -lz -ljpeg -ltiff -lIlmImf
